pageContext.claim: “More than 120 Democrats in Congress have signed up for Bernie Sanders total government takeover of health care. Now, tell me many of you have phenomenal health care. You have private health care 180 million people they want to take it away from you. They want to take away your health care, your health insurance they want to take it away.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump leaves out that this Medicare-for-all proposal in theory would replace private insurance with government-funded plans. So the 180 million people on private plans through employers would not necessarily go without coverage. Nearly 123 million Americans are covered already through a government plan, such as Medicare, Medicaid or the military health system, according to the Census Bureau.
